column4: what exactly is a "portable ubuntu.img image"?  How are you attempting to run mysql?  What exactly happens when you try?

linuxforandroid. installed with sudo apt-get install -y mysql-server, running with sudo service mysql start. Nothing happens. It doesn't display any errors, but also doesn't actually run and create the socket
so nothing in ps -ef?  What happens when you run the server directly and avoid using service?
no mention of it in ps -ef
